wikipedia_page.main:
Brian Hanscomb is an artist engraver from St Breward, Cornwall.
Brian Hanscomb was born in 1944 at Croxley Green, Hertfordshire. His work is inspired by Quakerism, Zen Buddhism and Bodmin Moor. He served an apprenticeship in letterpress engraving and also trained as a gravure engraver.His work is in the Government Art Collection, New York Public Library the Science Museum, London and the  National Gallery of Australia. Hanscomb is a Fellow of the Royal Society of Painter-Printmakers.In 2010 Resurgence magazine described Hanscomb as "Britain's leading copperplate engraver".

response: * Brian Hanscomb, an artist engraver, lives in the village.
